attributes.action: Sell the Crown Jewels to pay off the national dept
attributes.additional_details: The Saudi Boys have so much money they are finding it very difficult to find places to put it. we sell them the Crown Jewels for 5 Trillion pounds. They have only been used about 40 times in the past 60 yrs. What would you rather see, kids starving in our streets or some sparkly stones in a prison.
